column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Before I get into what we ordered
column2: I have to mention the restaurant's interior. It's extremely spacious with an open floor concept. The high ceilings and lighting really set a nice ambiance. We originally wanted to sit at the patio
column3: but it was either not for sitting outside
column4: or it was too early and the tables were not set up yet. I'm not sure since it was our first time.
